XenotypeDef.label: Elf
XenotypeDef.description: The elves were once thought of just as fairy tales and story's to tell. Things changed drastically as these woodland elves emerged from the forests dedicated to protecting the woodlands. Furthermore, the elves have gone to war with their offspring the night elves.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: These woodland elves emerged from the forests dedicated to protecting the woodlands.

XenotypeDef.label: Night Elf
XenotypeDef.description: Descendants of the elves these purple beings were once a powerful and mystical race. When the elves descended from the forests the night elves slowly followed them attempting to subject and destroy their archenemies the elves from the inside.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Descendants of the elves these purple beings were once a powerful and mystical race.

XenotypeDef.label: Dwarf
XenotypeDef.description: Not much is known of the dwarves many say that the appearance of the elves forced them out of hiding. The dwarves typically stay in their mountain homes drinking the night away. But be warned these creatures are incredibly brutal and if made an enemy they will strike.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The dwarves typically stay in their mountain homes drinking the night away.

XenotypeDef.label: Orc
XenotypeDef.description: Orcs are savage and brutal beasts dedicated to the great Waaagh. Beware these beasts as only one can take on an entire village.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Orcs are savage and brutal beasts
